mapper.select: select sum(oMoney) oMoney,extract (MONTH from oDate) as oDate,ostutas from orders group by oDate,ostutas order by oDate,ostutas desc

select (select count(1) from orders where ostutas=1) onum,(select count(1) from orders where ostutas=2) success, (select count(1)from orders where ostutas=1)waits,(select count(1) from orders) allnum, (select sum(oMoney) from orders) omoney,extract (MONTH from oDate) as oDate,oStutas from orders group by oDate,oStutas order by oDate,oStutas desc

select sum(o.omoney) omoney,o.oid oid,o.ostutas ostutas,o.odate odate,a.aname aname,a.adetail adetail,a.atel atel from orders o ,address a where a.aid=o.aid group by o.oid,o.ostutas,a.aname,a.adetail,a.atel ,o.odate
mapper.update: update orders set ostutas=1 where oid=#{oid}
